column4: When I try to download compiz (thru apt) it gives me an error about broken packages.. could you give me a repo which works?
deb http://www.beerorkid.com/compiz edgy main-edgy for example
it doesn't work.
whats the message exactly?
see PM
I see no PM here..
yes, I understand it, but I see no window with your name...
I received "test". Do you see my message now?
sorry... maybe gaim does not like you. ;)
and are you logged in?
hm, where have you foudn this? and do you have edgy?
I found this at http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=1404733 And yeah, I have edgy.
please comment out the other pakcages lists in sources.list and reload.
what others? The official Ubuntu stuff?
just use the official Ubuntu stuff. no beerorkid or anything else.
and try the command again? Mkay.
try my command. :)
what command?
"sudo apt-get install compiz compiz-core compiz-gnome compiz-plugins libxcomposite1"
works.
fine. :)
how about configuring it?
how about CGWD?
what's this for?
